name: Die for the Empire
description: The planet Agora VI, a critical industrial center within the Terran Empire, has been invaded by an unknown alien force. You must hold the planet at all costs. We have no further details, you have no further orders. Good luck.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 处理器: AMD Athlon(tm) II X4 645 Processor 内存: 40 MB RAM 存储空间: 需要 64 MB 可用空间
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows 8 处理器: AMD FX(tm)-4300 Quad-Core Processor 内存: 50 MB RAM 存储空间: 需要 64 MB 可用空间

reviews.review_text: worst game ever..  from its controls to graphics, all aspects are terrible..
